tool_description: Validates and cleanses customer data for pricing analysis, checking for completeness, consistency, and data quality issues.

customer_data.description: Array of customer IDs to validate

validation_rules.description: Validation rules to apply: completeness, format, range, consistency

data_source.description: Source system identifier (CRM, ERP, Web, Mobile)

error_messages: Invalid customer data format: Ensure customer_data contains valid customer IDs as strings.
Unsupported validation rule: Use one of [completeness, format, range, consistency].
Data source not recognized: Use a valid source identifier.
Empty dataset: Provide at least one customer ID for validation.
usage: Provide customer_data array, validation_rules to apply, and data_source. Returns validation results and cleaned customer dataset.

valid_customers.description: List of customer IDs that passed validation

invalid_customers.description: List of customer IDs that failed validation

validation_summary.description: Summary of validation results and data quality metrics
